title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 60 - Medicine, Physician Assistant, Specialist Assistant And Acupuncture
content:

§ 60.2 - Clinical clerkships

§ 60.9 - Acupuncture

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 60

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 605, 6501, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 6524, 6525, 6526, 6541, 6548; L. 1990, ch. 729

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
